summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2834, for the improvement of 31st Avenue South from the south margin of Jackson Street to the north margin of Norman Street on the west, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by constructing and reconstructing all sewers, side sewers and water mains, and their appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage, drainage, water service and fire protection of said district; also the construction of all necessary concrete sidewalk and concrete curbs with armored concrete corners, and such other work as may be necessary.
